message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $14,000. I believe it will be highly valuable to you, and this is a fair starting point for negotiations.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $14,000 is already a very competitive price for this product. How about we meet in the middle at $12,500?

I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we try $11,500? I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchase the product if we can meet at this price.
